mapper.insert: insert into user_info(uno, id, pw, email, nickname, xpos, ypos, addr) values(user_uno_seq.nextVal, #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{xpos}, #{ypos}, #{addr})
mapper.select: select uno, id, email, nickname, xpos, ypos from user_info where uno in (select fno from user_relation where uno =#{uno})
select uno, id, email, nickname, xpos, ypos from user_info where id = #{id}
select id, nickname from user_info where id = #{id} and id not in #{myId}
select count(*) from user_relation where uno=#{uno} and fno=#{fno}
select uno from user_info where id = #{id}
